altername_name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Motto Gakuensai no Ouji-sama: More Sweet Edition
name: Tennis no Oji-Sama: Motto Gakuensai no Ouji-Sama: More Sweet Edition
overview: Tennis no Oji-Sama: Motto Gakuensai no Ouji-Sama - More Sweet Edition is an Adventure game, developed by Silicon Studio and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2010.
